name: Based On Subsequent Form With Backref
result:
John Doe, His Book (2000); John Doe, His Other Book (2001).
Jane Roe, Her Book (1998).
Jane Roe, Her Other Book (1999).
Doe, His Book, supra note 1.
Roe, supra note 2.
csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
 <citation>
 <layout delimiter="; " suffix=".">
 <choose>
 <if position="subsequent">
 <names variable="author">
 <name form="short"/>
 </names>
 <choose>
 <if variable="fuckingnothing" match="any">
 <text value="shit"/>
 </if>
 </choose>
 <text value="supra note" prefix=", " suffix=" "/>
 <number variable="first-reference-note-number"/>
 </if>
 <else>
 <names variable="author">
 <name/>
 </names>
 <text variable="title" prefix=", "/>
 <date variable="issued">
 <date-part name="year" prefix=" (" suffix=")"/>
 </date>
 </else>
 </choose>
 </layout>
 </citation>
</style>
